title: Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression 'row[0]' is set
description: When setting a filter expression like 'row[0] equals to 0', the result set is either null or incorrect.
OB: The first record returned when previewing the data set with the filter expression 'row[0] equals to'.
EB: The expected behavior is that the filter expression 'row[0]' should not be valid since 'row[0]' can only be generated after all the data have been fetched, and should not be used as a filter expression.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Set a filter in the data set with the expression 'row[0] equals to '
2. Click on the Preview tab
